name: Prime World: Defenders 2
description: Defenders 2, - an exciting hybrid of Tower Defense and CCG, - is now available on Steam! Challenge endless hordes of monsters: build an impassable defense on their path and protect your mines. Collect all the unique towers and prove that even a tornado is not an obstacle for you.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2,66 Ghz or AMD Phenom™ X3 2,4 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 240 / Radeon HD 6570 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION IS REQUIRED TO PLAY
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION IS REQUIRED TO PLAY
